name: Fiendish Darkness
text: You can use your darkness spell-like ability more often.
benefit: You can use darkness three times per day as a spell-like ability.
normal: Tieflings can use darkness once per day as a spell-like ability.
text_zh: 你可以更频繁地使用黑暗术类法术能力。
prerequisites_zh: 黑暗术类法术能力，魔裔。
benefit_zh: 你每天能够以类法术能力施放3次黑暗术。
normal_zh: 魔裔每天能够以类法术能力施放1次黑暗术。
